placeholders.description:
A placeholder for making a class or html element use the embedded styles. This class or
element will need to be contained in a class containing `.md-media` to get the correct
styles.

context.name: md-media-embedded
react-md-media

usedBy.description: Very simple mixin to only include the `.md-media-embedded` class.

variables.description: The default aspect ratios to include.

context.name: react-md-media

variables.description: A boolean if the overlay styles should be included.
Boolean if the `.md-media-embedded` class name should be included.

A list of class name or html tags that will get the embedded media styles applied
by default in the `.md-media` container.
The color to use for the media overlay's background color.

usedBy.description: Creates the styles for the media overlay.

context.name: react-md-media-overlay
react-md-media

parameter.name: include-overlay
parameter.description: Boolean if the overlay styles should be included.

parameter.name: include-embedded
parameter.description:
Boolean if the embedded class name should be included.
    This does not affect the `$embedded-selectors` param.

parameter.name: embedded-selectors
parameter.description:
A list of class name or html tags to apply the
    embedded styles to by default within a `.md-media` container.

usedBy.description:
Includes every component, transition, and typography including their
media queries if the `$md-media-included` variable is `true`. You can
modify any global variables before including this mixin to change the overall
theme.

context.name: react-md-everything

mixins.description:
Creates a media aspect ratio that will make the `.md-media-embedded\` or any of the
`$md-media-embedded-selectors` children keep the aspect ratio.

context.name: react-md-media

mixins.description: Very simple mixin to only include the `.md-media-embedded` class.

context.name: react-md-media

mixins.description: Creates the styles for the media overlay.

context.name: react-md-media-overlay
react-md-media
